subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Taxation
lead_paragraph: With the Giants and the Jets set to open a new stadium in 2010, the debate builds in Easter Rutherford, N.J., over the use of public dollars to help fund privately owned sports franchises.
snippet: With the Giants and the Jets set to open a new stadium in 2010, the debate builds in Easter Rutherford, N.J., over the use of public dollars to help fund privately owned sports franchises.
